docs.snippet: Visitors to the Louvre learned by loudspeaker announcement of Friday's attempted attack on the Paris museum and there was no panic, witnesses said, though some children cried as guards directed people to sit tight together and away from windows....
docs.lead_paragraph: Visitors to the Louvre learned by loudspeaker announcement of Friday's attempted attack on the Paris museum and there was no panic, witnesses said, though some children cried as guards directed people to sit tight together and away from windows.

docs.snippet: Iran's Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif tweeted on Friday that Tehran would never use its military might against any country, except in self-defense, in reaction to U.S. President Donald Trump's tough approach towards Tehran....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran's Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif tweeted on Friday that Tehran would never use its military might against any country, except in self-defense, in reaction to U.S. President Donald Trump's tough approach towards Tehran.

docs.snippet: Myanmar's national police chief has taken personal charge of an investigation into the killing of a prominent lawyer and adviser to Aung San Suu Kyi's ruling party, police sources said, after leaks and conflicting comments by officers about its pr...
docs.lead_paragraph: Myanmar's national police chief has taken personal charge of an investigation into the killing of a prominent lawyer and adviser to Aung San Suu Kyi's ruling party, police sources said, after leaks and conflicting comments by officers about its progress.

headline.main: Myanmar's Probe of Lawyer's Killing Beset by Leaks, Confusion

docs.snippet: In an attack on Germany, U.S. President Donald Trump's top trade adviser said the euro was "grossly undervalued", a charge which may ring true for the German economy but not for the 19-member currency zone as a whole....
docs.lead_paragraph: In an attack on Germany, U.S. President Donald Trump's top trade adviser said the euro was "grossly undervalued", a charge which may ring true for the German economy but not for the 19-member currency zone as a whole.

headline.main: Euro May Be Too Weak for Germany but Too Strong for Others
headline.print_headline: Euro May Be Too Weak for Germany but Too Strong for Others

docs.snippet: The U.S. Senate could vote as early as Monday on confirming President Donald Trump's pick for education secretary, Betsy DeVos, with the political parties potentially entering a standoff requiring Vice President Mike Pence to act as tie-breaker....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Senate could vote as early as Monday on confirming President Donald Trump's pick for education secretary, Betsy DeVos, with the political parties potentially entering a standoff requiring Vice President Mike Pence to act as tie-breaker.

headline.main: Senate Sets Fight Over Education Secretary for Next Week
headline.print_headline: Senate Sets Fight Over Education Secretary for Next Week

docs.snippet: Deutsche Boerse and the London Stock Exchange will offer the European Commission to make small adjustments to their combined business in the area of derivatives clearing in a bid to win antitrust approval of their planned merger, two people famili...
docs.lead_paragraph: Deutsche Boerse and the London Stock Exchange will offer the European Commission to make small adjustments to their combined business in the area of derivatives clearing in a bid to win antitrust approval of their planned merger, two people familiar with the matter said.

headline.main: Deutsche Boerse, LSE to Offer Small Antitrust Concessions-Sources
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Boerse, LSE to Offer Small Antitrust Concessions-Sources
